content.text:
# Analysis of Main Target Image

## Count & Layers
The structure consists of approximately 10 building blocks arranged in 4 distinct layers:
- Layer 1 (Bottom): 3 green blocks forming a U-shaped base
- Layer 2: 1 yellow horizontal rectangular block
- Layer 3: 3 blocks forming the house body (blue cube, red cube, green horizontal block)
- Layer 4 (Top): 3 orange triangular roof pieces

## Spatial Relationships
- The base consists of a green horizontal block (middle) with a green cube on each end
- A yellow horizontal beam rests on top of this base
- On the yellow beam sits two cubes side by side (blue left, red right)
- A green horizontal rectangle sits on top of these cubes
- Three orange triangular pieces form the roof on top

# Required Blocks from Dictionary

Based on analysis, the following blocks are needed:
- 1 Blue cube (index 1)
- 2 Green cubes (index 2)
- 1 Red cube (index 3)
- 1 Yellow horizontal rectangle (index 8)
- 1 Green horizontal rectangle (index 5)
- 1 Green horizontal rectangle (index 7)
- 3 Orange triangular roof pieces (indices 11, 14, and 15)

# Assembly Order

```
{
   Step1: Move block with index 2
   Step2: Move block with index 7
   Step3: Move block with index 2
   Step4: Move block with index 8
   Step5: Move block with index 1
   Step6: Move block with index 3
   Step7: Move block with index 5
   Step8: Move block with index 11
   Step9: Move block with index 14
   Step10: Move block with index 15
}
```
